description.value: You can share hidden messages using technical business and corporate jargon, using Business or Corporate Lore to disguise the true meaning of your words. Any allies who have traveled alongside you for at least 1 full week or are trained in the same Lore skill automatically discern your meaning. Other observers must succeed at a Perception check against your Business or Corporate Lore DC to realize you're passing a secret message, and they must critically succeed to understand the message.
